main event: An unidentified flying object was observed in Alexandria, Louisiana on 6 November 1954.
interesting points: The object was cigar shaped and silver in color,Flashing lights were seen on the sides of the object,The observation lasted less than one minute,The object was described as stationary for a few seconds before moving rapidly to the southeast,The reliability of the witness was deemed good.
sighted object: unidentified flying object, silver and cigar shaped
